order.title: Order
order.emptySpeech: Your order is empty. Choose a drink to start building it.
tts.helper.kiosk: Need it read aloud? Use the speaker.
tts.intro.kiosk: Welcome to the MatchaBoba self-service kiosk. Tap a drink to customize ice, sugar, and toppings before adding it to your order.
tts.intro.cashier: Cashier ordering screen. Select a drink, adjust ice, sugar, or toppings, and add it to the order.
tts.menuButton: Drink {name}. {price} dollars. Press enter to customize ice, sugar, and toppings.
tts.orderLine: Order item {num}. {name}. Price {price} dollars. Ice {ice}, sugar {sugar}, topping {topping}.
menu.table.name: Name
menu.summary.empty: Menu item management. There are no menu items yet. Use the add menu item button to create one.
menu.summary: Menu item management. There are {count} items. {highlights} Use the add menu item button to create an item, or the edit and delete buttons in the Actions column to update existing ones.
menu.row: Menu item {id}. {name}. {description}. Price {price} dollars. Calories {calories}. Use edit or delete to change.
reports.title: Generate Reports
home.title: Welcome to MatchaBoba POS
home.body: Tap in with us by logging in if you are an employee. Take a look at our menu board! Or visit our self-service kiosk to order it yourself.
login.title: Sign In
login.denied: Access Denied: Email not found in system.
employees.title: Employee Management
employees.table.name: Name
employees.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this employee?
inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
manager.title: Manager View
manager.body: Use the navigation above to manage store operations.
